gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 111, Hornets 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Hornets, 111-100. DeMar DeRozan recorded 29 points, six rebounds, and three assists for the Bulls, with Nikola Vucevic adding 20 points and 12 rebounds in the victory. Gordon Hayward tallied 27 points, four rebounds, and four assists for the Hornets in the defeat. The Bulls improve to 8-14 in the regular season, while the Hornets fall to 6-13.
